cast.overview: Shortly after David Abbott moves into his new San Francisco digs, he has an unwelcome visitor on his hands: winsome Elizabeth Masterson, who asserts that the apartment is hers -- and promptly vanishes. When she starts appearing and disappearing at will, David thinks she's a ghost, while Elizabeth is convinced she's alive.
cast.title: Just Like Heaven

cast.overview: Long ago, in the fantasy world of Kumandra, humans and dragons lived together in harmony. But when an evil force threatened the land, the dragons sacrificed themselves to save humanity. Now, 500 years later, that same evil has returned and it’s up to a lone warrior, Raya, to track down the legendary last dragon to restore the fractured land and its divided people.
cast.title: Raya and the Last Dragon

details.biography: Lucille Soong (born August 15, 1938) is a Chinese-American actress, perhaps best known for her role as Grandma Jenny Huang in the television series Fresh Off the Boat.
details.name: Lucille Soong
